[30;1m38 | [0m[35m    There are a few main differences though:[0m
[30;1m39 | [0m[35m      * the Ceph python bindings are not available on Windows yet, so we'll[0m
[30;1m40 | [0m[35m        always do a local mount. Besides, Hyper-V cannot use librbd, so[0m
[30;1m41 | [0m[35m        we'll need to do a local mount anyway.[0m
[30;1m42 | [0m[35m      * The device names aren't handled in the same way. On Windows,[0m
[30;1m43 | [0m[35m        disk names such as "\\\\.\\PhysicalDrive1" are provided by the OS and[0m
[30;1m44 | [0m[35m        cannot be explicitly requsted.[0m

[30;1m42 | [0m[35m    # If not, this is a no-op so won't hurt either.[0m
[30;1m43 | [0m[35m    git merge $PREV_COMMIT[0m
